column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: marriage. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix MarriageOntology: <http://www.example.org/marriage#> .MarriageOntology:Person rdf:type owl:Class .MarriageOntology:Marriage rdf:type owl:Class .MarriageOntology:Woman rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf MarriageOntology:Person .MarriageOntology:Man rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf MarriageOntology:Person .MarriageOntology:isMarriedTo rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain MarriageOntology:Person ;    rdfs:range MarriageOntology:Person .MarriageOntology:hasSpouse rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf MarriageOntology:isMarriedTo ;    owl:inverseOf MarriageOntology:isMarriedTo .MarriageOntology:Marriage rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf [      rdf:type owl:Restriction ;      owl:onProperty MarriageOntology:hasSpouse ;      owl:cardinality "1"^^xsd:nonNegativeInteger] .```
